ingredient.name: Saccharomyces boulardii
ingredient.description: Beneficial yeast probiotic with antibiotic resistance and pathogen inhibition

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Anti-inflammatory factors and protease production inhibit pathogenic bacteria
Yeast maintains during antibiotic therapy and modulates inflammatory response

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Increases sIgA and modulates inflammatory response while maintaining intestinal barrier

symptom_effects.population_notes: Reduces antibiotic-associated diarrhea by 57% and prevents C. difficile recurrence

citations.title: Multiple meta-analyses showing consistent AAD prevention
